price: (Musa) aravuga ati “Bari inyuma yanjye barankurikiye; nihutiye kugusanga Nyagasani, kugira ngo wishime.”
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
